news_header: Zacks Equity Research highlights Primerica as a strong buy and Dow as a strong sell, providing insights on their financial performance and market outlook.
news_original_title: Primerica and Dow in the Box have been highlighted as Zacks Bull and Bear of the Day
news_text: Zacks Equity Research identifies Primerica (PRI) as the Bull of the Day, showcasing its strong performance in the financial services sector, particularly for middle-income households, and its positive earnings surprises. Conversely, Dow (DOW) is labeled as the Bear of the Day due to its struggles in a weak economic environment, missing earnings estimates and facing declining demand. Shopify (SHOP) is also discussed, anticipating strong growth in its upcoming earnings report, driven by an expanding merchant base and international presence.
